summary: Comprehensive testing of eLearning 360 project management system completed successfully. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% test pass rate. Frontend UI working well with minor calendar interaction issue. All core features including user authentication, project management, task tracking, and role-based access control are operational.

resolved_issues.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error in project creation
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Added _id field removal before JSON serialization

ui_bugs.issue: End date selection timeout in new project form
ui_bugs.workaround: Start date selection works, end date can be selected with different approach

passed_tests: User registration flow (first user becomes admin)
User login with existing admin credentials
Project creation with automatic task generation
Project detail UI with module accordions
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix calendar date picker interaction in new project form - the end date selection has timeout issues. Consider using a different selector strategy or simplifying the date input method.
